content: I agree that discovery could benefit from keeping up with the latest trends in interactive media. by doing so, they would likely enhance the quality of their content and provide viewers with a more immersive experience. the inclusion of interactive elements could also help discovery stand out among other streaming services, especially if they leverage new and innovative technologies to create unique and engaging experiences for their viewers. additionally, by improving interactivity, discovery has the potential to increase engagement and drive viewer loyalty, which could lead to long-term success with its audiences. overall, incorporating interactive elements could be a valuable strategy for discovery to stay relevant and competitive in the ever-changing media landscape.
